EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Post-event (No Show) Munich
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Sorry we missed you at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow in Munich on July 13th, 2016. If you are interested in having Pivotal present cloud native content to your organization or want to learn more about Pivotal, contact us <[[mailto:emea_isr@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a follow up with our team.
We have made our presentation slides available here <[[https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BwA78Sj43bSPalhLbmI0UTMxWDA&usp=sharing]]>.
If you want to see more in depth presentations on cloud native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us again at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io/]]>, August 1â€“4.
The Pivotal Team
